#ifndef BEAST_VIEWPORT_RENDERER_H
#define BEAST_VIEWPORT_RENDERER_H

#include <vector>
#include <math.h>
#include <maya/MViewportRenderer.h>
#include <maya/MHardwareRenderer.h>
#include <maya/MImage.h>
#include <maya/MMutexLock.h>
#include <maya/M3dView.h>
#include "liveasyncjob.h"

namespace beastmaya {

class PowLookup {
public:
        PowLookup(const unsigned int bits, const float gamma) {
                const unsigned int values = (1 << bits);
                m_maxIdx = values - 1;
                m_lookup.reserve(values);
                for (size_t i = 0; i < values; ++i) {
                        const float v = (float)i / (float)m_maxIdx;
                        m_lookup.push_back((unsigned char)(255.0f * powf(v, gamma)));
                }
        }

        unsigned char lookup(const float v) {
                if (v <= 0 || v != v) {
                        return 0x00;
                } else if (v >= 1) {
                        return 0xff;
                }
                const size_t idx = (size_t)(v * m_maxIdx);
                return m_lookup[idx];
        }

private:
        std::vector<unsigned char> m_lookup;
        unsigned int m_maxIdx;
};

class ViewportRenderer : public MViewportRenderer {
public:

        ViewportRenderer(const MString& name);
        
        ~ViewportRenderer() {
                deregisterRenderer();
                uninitialize();
        }

        MStatus initialize() {
                MHardwareRenderer *rend = MHardwareRenderer::theRenderer();
                if (rend) {
                        m_GLFT = rend->glFunctionTable();
                        if (m_GLFT) {
                                m_frameList = m_GLFT->glGenLists(1);

                                m_GLFT->glNewList(m_frameList, MGL_COMPILE);
                                        m_GLFT->glBegin(MGL_QUADS);
                                                m_GLFT->glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 1.0f); 
                                                m_GLFT->glVertex3f(-1.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f);              // Top Left

                                                m_GLFT->glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 1.0f); 
                                                m_GLFT->glVertex3f(1.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f);              // Top Right

                                                m_GLFT->glTexCoord2f(1.0f, 0.0f); 
                                                m_GLFT->glVertex3f(1.0f, -1.0f, 0.0f);              // Bottom Right

                                                m_GLFT->glTexCoord2f(0.0f, 0.0f); 
                                                m_GLFT->glVertex3f(-1.0f, -1.0f, 0.0f);              // Bottom Left
                                        m_GLFT->glEnd();
                                m_GLFT->glEndList();
                                
                                m_GLFT->glGenTextures(1, &m_frameTexture);  
                        } else {
                                return MStatus::kFailure;
                        }
                }

                return MStatus::kSuccess;
        }

        MStatus uninitialize() {
                m_GLFT->glDeleteLists(m_frameList, 1);
                m_GLFT->glDeleteTextures(1, &m_frameTexture);

                return MStatus::kSuccess;
        }

        bool nativelySupports(MViewportRenderer::RenderingAPI api, float version) {
                return (api == MViewportRenderer::kSoftware || api == MViewportRenderer::kOpenGL);
        }

        bool override(MViewportRenderer::RenderingOverride override) {
                return (override == MViewportRenderer::kOverrideThenStandard);
        }
        
        virtual unsigned int  overrideThenStandardExclusion () const {
                M3dView theView = M3dView::active3dView();

                MString rendererName;
                theView.getRendererString(rendererName);
                if (rendererName != "BEAST_VIEWPORT_RENDERER") {
                        return MViewportRenderer::kExcludeMeshes;
                }

                if (theView.isShadeActiveOnly()) {
                        return MViewportRenderer::kExcludeNone;
                }

                M3dView::DisplayStyle ds = theView.displayStyle();
                if (ds == M3dView::kWireFrame || ds == M3dView::kPoints || ds == M3dView::kBoundingBox) {
                        return MViewportRenderer::kExcludeNone;
                }

                return MViewportRenderer::kExcludeMeshes;
        }
        
        virtual MStatus render(const MRenderingInfo &renderInfo);

        void setFrameBufferData(const std::vector<unsigned char>& pixels, int width, int height, int channels);
        void setFrameBufferData(const std::vector<float>& pixels, int width, int height, int channels);

        LiveAsyncJobPtr createViewportJob(JobContextPtr& bjc, BeastCameraPtr& renderCam, bool cameraRender) {
                return LiveAsyncJobPtr(new BeastViewportLiveJob(bjc, renderCam, cameraRender, *this));
        }

private:
        MGLFunctionTable *m_GLFT;
        MGLuint m_frameTexture;
        MGLuint m_frameList;

        std::vector<unsigned char> m_framebufferData;
        int m_framebufferWidth, m_framebufferHeight;
        bool m_framebufferUpdated;
        MMutexLock m_fbLock;
        PowLookup m_powLookup;

        class BeastViewportLiveJob : public LiveAsyncJob {
        public:
                BeastViewportLiveJob(JobContextPtr& bjc, BeastCameraPtr& renderCam, bool cameraRender, ViewportRenderer& bvr) : LiveAsyncJob(bjc, renderCam, cameraRender), m_viewportRenderer(bvr) {
                }

                virtual void onUpdate(ILBUpdateType updateType);
        private:
                ViewportRenderer& m_viewportRenderer;
        };
};

}

#endif //BEAST_VIEWPORT_RENDERER_H
